candidates.name: Campbell Barry
candidates.why_elect: Lower Hutt's my home. It's where I grew up, and it's where my wife Laura and I plan to raise our kids. I've been a city councillor for the past 6 years and have a range of public and private sector experience. Most importantly, I'm strongly grounded in my community.
candidates.why_stand: I love our city. Lower Hutt has a lot going for it, but unless we front up to the big challenges we face—Transport, housing, infrastructure and protecting our environment; then we won't reach our full potential. I'm standing because I want to tackle these issues head on.

candidates.name: Ray Wallace
candidates.why_elect: My mayoralty has been about "Putting People First". I am passionate about our city and want to see every resident prosper. I am proud of what my united council has achieved for our people. Let's keep the positive momentum going. Re-elect Mayor Ray Wallace.
candidates.why_stand: Our city has gone through the biggest rejuvenation programme in the city's history. We have built many new community facilities for example Walter Nash and Huia Pool extension. I am excited about our future but there is still much to do. I have the mayoral experience needed.
